analysis.key_quote: The proposed change is another nail in the coffin of U.S. scientific research which will ultimately weaken the quality of our scientific work force, the value of the science produced, and the competitive advantage that our country has as a function of our unparalleled scientific partnership between government and universities.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of scientific research and the potential negative impact on the quality and integrity of the scientific workforce.
